title: RP Purchase Error Rito Pls
body:
riot please... i double purchase RP thought my first didnt go thru then i tried another 1 then the congratulation teemo  logo appears but 
the RP points didnt go thru... then i realized the store is under maintenance .. help please.

replies.body:
Hey there,

* Has this issue been resolved yet?
* Were you charged?

If you were charged and are still yet to have the issue resolved, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support so they can look into this further for you.
